annotation.spannedText: primary care and specialty medical care providers should provide Hepatitis B vaccination whenever indicated or requested as part of regular preventive care

classMention.mentionClass: primary care and specialty medical care providers should provide Hepatitis B vaccination whenever indicated or requested as part of regular preventive care

annotation.spannedText: providers implement standing orders to identify adults recommended for Hepatitis B vaccination and administer vaccination as part of routine services
